import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer-section', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], template: `

`, styles: [ ] }) export class FooterSectionComponent { @Input() routeLink?: string; navigateToNewComponent() { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } }
